sections.MISSION:
Bull Troop conducts Land Navigation Training IVO Hohenfels Training Area (HTA) on 27-29SEP2022 in order to build individual Soldier Skills and familiarize Soldiers the HTA prior to Dragoon Ready ‘23.
Leader’s
sections.PURPOSE: of this training is to develop individual Soldier skills and familiarize Soldiers with HTA
sections.KEY TASKS:
Conduct a deliberate TRM to and from HTA
Conduct individual, day & night, dismounted & mounted land navigation in a variety of terrain
Conduct an MWR event while at HTA
sections.END STATE:
/Training Outcomes:
All Soldiers safely and successfully execute individual, group, and mounted Day/Night land navigation.
Concept of the Operation: Bull Troop SP’s from Rose Barracks the morning of 27 SEP to HTA. Bull Troop will set up a dismounted and mounted land navigation course the morning of 27 SEP.
Soldiers will conduct day and night iterations as individuals on day 1 and Squads on day 2. Simultaneously, crews will conduct individual mounted land navigation on day 1 and Section land navigation on day 2.
On Thursday, 29 SEP, Bull Troop will TRM to Rose Barracks and complete day 0 recovery until completion.
